query: Purgatory Road Race gravel race Fredericksburg

videos.title: What I'm Taking on My First 200 Mile Race!
videos.description:
#stampede200 #ultraendurance #cyclinggear #cyclingrace #texashellweek 

I'm racing in the Stampede 200 race in Fredericksburg, TX on April 1st - here's a rundown of the bike, kit, gear, tools, and nutrition I'm taking along! There is no support on the course, but there are two aid stations and one resupply, so I have to be prepared for everything! This is my first ultra endurance race, so I hope I'll have everything I need!

The Stampede 200 is a 200 mile bike race with a whopping 10,000 feet of climbing! It's my first ever ultra endurance race, the farthest I've ever attempted to cycle, and the most elevation I've ever tackled. It's part of Texas Hell Week, a week-long event in the hill country of central Texas. Learn more at: https://www.raamchallenge.com/about

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Follow me on Instagram: @ericbarnettcycling
Like, share, and subscribe for a lot more content!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you're looking to buy some of the things in the video for yourself, consider clicking my affiliate link! It's what helps keep this channel going!
Clif Bloks Energy Chews: https://amzn.to/3LGqSD8
Clif Shot Energy Gels: https://amzn.to/3LGwMV3
XTEND BCAA Powder: https://amzn.to/40ReCEp
Pro Bike Tool CO2 Inflator: https://amzn.to/3LGKpTX
Replacement CO2 Catrtiges: https://amzn.to/425MajH
700 x 25-32 inner tubes: https://amzn.to/3LmK87x

videos.title: Canadian Cycling Team explores the Texas Hill Country
videos.description: Eight cycling friends on seven-day cycling experience to ride 50 - 60+ miles per day in the Austin & Fredericksburg area. That was so fun.
tags: cycyling bike tour hill country road

videos.title: The Wildest Jumps in Rallying History
videos.description:
From the iconic jumps of Finland's fast and flowing stages to the treacherous Fafe in Portugal, we've curated a collection of the craziest jumps that have tested the limits of both man and machine.
Relive these awe-inspiring moments that have become legendary in the world of rally. Marvel at the sheer skill, bravery, and precision of the drivers as they tackle these gravity-defying leaps at blistering speeds. From iconic cars to iconic locations, this video is a tribute to the daredevils who have pushed the boundaries of what is possible in the rally world.

#wrc #rally
______
Experience the world of Red Bull Rally like you have never seen it before. With the best rallying videos on the web and original series, prepare for your “stoke factor” to be at an all time high.

Subscribe to Red Bull Rally on Youtube: https://win.gs/SubToRedBullRally

Get the FREE Red Bull TV apps for all your devices: http://onelink.to/yfbct7

Watch Red Bull TV: http://win.gs/WatchRBTV

Check out https://redbull.com

videos.title: Trees Ranch Offroad Park Fredericksburg Texas Off Road Readiness Check
videos.description:
Terrain doesn’t lie — and neither do these parks.
This video breaks down what the ground actually demands so you understand the traction, momentum, and control required before you roll in.
Clear terrain evaluation for riders who take where they ride seriously.
If something here resonates, there’s a small thank-you waiting at checkout with code CREW at offroadsigns.store. It’s always there.
https://www.offroadsigns.store/  Trees Ranch Offroad Park – Fredericksburg Texas. Are you actually ready?
Notice who rolls onto Texas Hill Country limestone and checks traction before committing to a climb. Watch what happens when throttle stays measured over loose caliche instead of surging and breaking grip. As you picture easing across an off-camber rock slab, you can feel how abrupt braking shifts weight downhill and forces correction. Terrain like this is where riders quietly decide things. And what it reveals doesn’t always stay at the park.
Average riders react to the ledge in front of them. Controlled riders read approach angle, surface texture, and exit line before entry. One experiences the obstacle. The other carries what it proved.
Now here’s what separates them. Limestone climbs demand steady momentum, not bursts. Embedded rock gardens require precise tire placement. Tight cedar-lined trails test visibility and steering discipline. Loose gravel descents punish late braking. Fatigue builds when inputs become reactive instead of deliberate.
And this is where it shifts. The difference shows up when traction changes mid-climb, when a hidden ledge appears, when gravity pulls harder than pride.
Some riders leave it behind. Others don’t.
Trails expose truth. Real riders keep the proof.

Remember... We are here to help!

When you need help finding the top expert resources for Off Road Metal Wall Art - Trees Ranch Offroad Park Fredericksburg - this is your ticket...

Visit our website.

Visit us online:

https://www.offroadsigns.store/
#OffRoadPark #OHVTrails #OffRoadLife
Visuals are representative footage used to illustrate terrain style and riding conditions. They may not be from this exact park.
This channel evaluates terrain and riding culture across the U.S
.
